-- | Connector for Amazon Products API
--   
--   Allows users to directly access Amazon Products API, without having to
--   work with the underlying REST and authentication layers.
@package amazon-products
@version 0.1.0.1

module Amazon.Utils
isASIN :: Text -> Bool

module Amazon.Types
nsName :: Text -> Name
timeFormat :: String
type AccessID = Text
type AccessSecret = ByteString
type AssociateTag = Text
data AmazonEndpoint
AmazonEndpoint :: String -> Text -> Text -> AmazonEndpoint
endpointURL :: AmazonEndpoint -> String
endpointHost :: AmazonEndpoint -> Text
endpointPath :: AmazonEndpoint -> Text
data AmazonConf
AmazonConf :: AmazonEndpoint -> Manager -> AccessID -> AccessSecret -> AssociateTag -> AmazonConf
amazonEndpoint :: AmazonConf -> AmazonEndpoint
amazonManager :: AmazonConf -> Manager
amazonAccessId :: AmazonConf -> AccessID
amazonAccessSecret :: AmazonConf -> AccessSecret
amazonAssociateTag :: AmazonConf -> AssociateTag
data AmazonFailure
AmazonFailure :: (Maybe AmazonError) -> AmazonFailure
ParseFailure :: (Maybe UnpickleError) -> AmazonFailure
OtherFailure :: (Maybe Text) -> AmazonFailure
data ResponseGroup
Accessories :: ResponseGroup

data OperationRequest
OperationRequest :: Text -> Map Text Text -> Double -> OperationRequest

data AmazonError
AmazonError :: Text -> Text -> Text -> AmazonError

data RequestContainer a
RequestContainer :: Bool -> a -> RequestContainer a

requestSubset :: RequestContainer a -> a

class Parameterize a
toParams :: Parameterize a => a -> [(Text, Text)]

instance Eq OperationRequest

instance Show AmazonFailure

module Amazon.Types.Item
data ItemLookupRequest

lookupVariationPage :: ItemLookupRequest -> VariationPage

module Amazon
liveConf :: Manager -> AccessID -> AccessSecret -> AssociateTag -> AmazonConf
newtype AmazonT a
AmazonT :: ResourceT (ReaderT AmazonConf (ErrorT AmazonFailure IO)) a -> AmazonT a
unAmazonT :: AmazonT a -> ResourceT (ReaderT AmazonConf (ErrorT AmazonFailure IO)) a
runAmazonT :: AmazonConf -> AmazonT a -> IO (Either AmazonFailure a)
amazonRequest :: (MonadIO m, MonadThrow m, MonadReader AmazonConf m) => Text -> [(Text, Text)] -> m Request
amazonGet :: Parameterize a => Text -> a -> PU [Node] b -> AmazonT (OperationRequest, b)
instance Functor AmazonT
instance Applicative AmazonT
instance Monad AmazonT
instance MonadIO AmazonT
instance MonadThrow AmazonT
instance MonadError AmazonFailure AmazonT
instance MonadReader AmazonConf AmazonT
instance MonadBase IO AmazonT
instance MonadResource AmazonT

module Amazon.Item
itemSearch :: Text -> SearchIndex -> [ResponseGroup] -> Condition -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Int -> AmazonT (OperationRequest, [Item])
itemLookup :: ItemID -> IdType -> [ResponseGroup] -> Condition -> AmazonT (OperationRequest, Item)
